onboarding.home.title: Welcome to GolfIQ-YOLO
onboarding.home.subtitle: Here’s a quick overview of what you can do:
onboarding.home.point.quickRound: Use Quick Round as your digital scorecard on the course.
onboarding.home.point.range: Use Range Practice for ball speed, carry and missions on the driving range.
onboarding.home.point.trip: Use Trip Mode for group rounds and live leaderboards on golf trips.
onboarding.home.point.profile: Check My GolfIQ to see your progress, insights and Smart Bag suggestions.
onboarding.home.demoDone: Demo profile loaded. You can now explore My GolfIQ.
onboarding.home.demoError: Could not load demo data. Please try again.
profile.title: My GolfIQ
profile.subtitle: Overview of your rounds, range practice and bag.
profile.insights.title: My GolfIQ insights
profile.insights.empty: Play a few rounds and range sessions to get personalized insights.
profile.insights.rounds.good_net_scoring: You often score well net compared to your handicap.
profile.insights.rounds.high_variance: Your scoring varies a lot between rounds – focus on consistency.
profile.insights.range.consistent_carry: Your carry distances are very consistent – great for club selection.
profile.insights.range.good_hit_rate: Your range hit rate is high – accuracy is a strength.
profile.insights.range.mission_completio: You rarely complete your range missions – try focusing one mission at a time.
profile.quickRounds.title: Quick rounds
profile.quickRounds.empty: You have not recorded any quick rounds yet.
profile.range.title: Range practice
profile.range.empty: No range ghosts saved yet. Try Target Bingo and save a ghost.
profile.range.bingoSummary: Target Bingo sessions: {{count}}, best lines in a session: {{best}}
profile.range.sessions.title: Range sessions
profile.range.sessions.tag.mixed_results: Mixed results – use this as warm-up
profile.bag.title: Bag snapshot
profile.bag.clubsWithCarry: {{count}} of {{total}} clubs have a carry distance set.
profile.bag.smartSync.title: Smart Bag suggestions
profile.bag.smartSync.empty: No suggestions yet. Play a few range sessions with specific clubs.
profile.caddie.title: Caddie insights
profile.caddie.subtitle: How often you see and follow club advice from the AI caddie.
profile.caddie.loadFailed: Could not load caddie insights right now.
profile.caddie.noMember: Caddie insights will appear here once we can link your rounds to a member profile.
profile.caddie.empty: We haven't recorded any caddie advice for you yet. Once you use the HUD with caddie tips during rounds, your stats will appear here.

quickRound.start.handicapHelp: (Optional) Used to compute net score; simple gross – handicap (v1).

quickround.autoHole.label: Auto-detect hole from GPS
quickRound.share.error: Could not copy the round summary.
quickRound.watch.label: Watch HUD

trip.start.genericError: Something went wrong, please try again.
trip.scoreboard.title: Trip scoreboard
trip.public.notFound: This trip scoreboard could not be found.
range.practice.title: Range practice
range.bingo.title: Target Bingo
range.bingo.subtitle: Hit distance bands on the range to complete bingo lines.
range.calibration.label: Calibration
range.calibration.guide.title: Set up your camera for ball tracking
range.calibration.guide.subtitle: Follow these steps for best ball speed and carry accuracy.
range.calibration.guide.step1: Place the phone behind the ball, slightly off the target line, so both ball and early flight are visible.
range.calibration.guide.step2: Tilt the camera so the ball sits in the lower third of the frame and give it clear contrast to the background.
range.calibration.guide.step3: Run the calibration wizard once per location to measure distance scale and FPS.
range.calibration.guide.step4: Use the test shot button to verify that Camera Fitness is green before you start your session.
range.mission.hint.start: Hit a few shots to see your groove meter fill up.
range.practice.targetBingo.title: Target Bingo
range.practice.gapping.title: Gapping
range.camera.bad: Camera not suitable for ball tracking
range.camera.reason.generic: Adjust camera position and light for more reliable tracking.
range.camera.reason.fps_low: Increase frame rate or shutter speed (more light helps).
range.camera.reason.blur_high: Reduce blur – stabilise phone and improve lighting.
range.camera.reason.mpx_low: Move the phone closer so the ball and club occupy more of the frame.
range.camera.reason.light_low: Scene is too dark – add light or move to a brighter spot.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your GolfIQ preferences and local data.
settings.plan.label: Current plan: {{plan}}
settings.userId.label: User ID
settings.userId.copyError: Could not copy the user ID.
settings.reset.description: These options only affect data stored on this device. They do not touch any backend data.
settings.reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the selected data on this device?
settings.reset.done: Selected data was reset on this device.
